quote: If you give a man a fish, he'll eat for a day, but if you teach him to fish, he'll eat all the fish you might have caught for yourself.--Advice of Paul Slater, the evil mediator, to Suze
quote_letters: IF YOU GIVE A MAN A FISH HELL EAT FOR A DAY BUT IF YOU TEACH HIM TO FISH HELL EAT ALL THE FISH YOU MIGHT HAVE CAUGHT FOR YOURSELF--ADVICE OF PAUL SLATER THE EVIL MEDIATOR TO SUZE
